REPLICATION SAMPLE SIZE: 65,332 European ancestry overweight individuals, 22,373 European ancestry class I obese individuals, 5,476 European ancestry class II obese individuals, 1,162 European ancestry class III obese individuals, up to 39,294 European ancestry controls
